com.navis.framework.presentation.charting

Class StandardChartThemeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.presentation.charting.StandardChartThemeHelper

  • public final class StandardChartThemeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has constants for the style theme for charts. It is plain Java, third-party chart agnostic.
    Author:
    Gisella Saavedra, May 25, 2011
